_sText:
Counter-Strike:Source High FPS [+] Config 2.0


Only a few commands have been altered to increase performance and to bring it in line with new Source-Engine.




Features:
  • improved stability
  • two additional shortcuts
  • increased fps
  • improved Netsettings
  • new BOT-Commands




Installation Guide
First delete the config-file "config.cfg" in

"Steam\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\cfg"

folder, making sure to back up information such as key bindings and sensitivity settings. Then simply paste the files to the path above.





SHORTCUTS:

  • Netsettings;
    1. High type exec highn
    2. Low type exec lown

  • Game Volume Control;
    1. Vol. Up press kp_plus
    2. Vol. Down press kp_minus

  •  Downloadfilter;
    1. All type exec dlall
    2. None type exec dln
    3. No Sounds type exec dlnos
    4. Only Sounds type exec dls

  • Bot Settings;
    1. Add Bots type exec bot
    2. Bot difficulty (hard) type exec botdefhar
    3. Bot difficulty (normal) type exec botdefnor
    4. Bot difficulty (low) type exec botdeflow
    5. Bot communication OFF type exec botradoff
    6. Bots only use the knife type bot_knives_only
    7. Bots only use the guns type bot_pistols_only
    8. Bots only use the sniper weapons type bot_snipers_only

  • Clear Console type exec cc
